name: What are P, NP, NP-complete, and NP-hard?
caption: www.quora.com
description: Answer (1 of 3): There are two classes of problems, P, and NP (there are many, many more, but we will ignore the rest here).  These stand for "Polynomial" and "Non-deterministic Polynomial".  Assuming knowledge of big-O notation, we'll move on from there.  Request an explanation and you shall hav...
